BINGO - GAME

Instruction's --

Instruction's

Enter a number between 1 and 25.

Click "Fill Board" to randomly populate the board.

The input will be marked on both the Player's and the Computer's boards.

After each move, the game will check all rows and columns.

The status of both the Player and the Computer will be updated accordingly.

If the numbers match a winning pattern, the player wins!

When someone wins, their name will be displayed on the screen.

To play again, click the "Play Again" button.
